headline: 2 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Berkshire Hathaway owns nearly 10% of Ally Financial, and it is by far the most unique bank stock in Buffett’s portfolio.  NVR is an asset-light homebuilder that is well positioned to thrive when interest rates fall.  Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A)(NYSE: BRK.B) owns dozens of stocks in its closely followed $287 billion portfolio, many of which were hand-picked by legendary investor Warren Buffett himself.
